title: "Software"

## `brclimr`

An R package to on-line access zonal statistics from weather indicators that were calculated for each municipality in Brazil using data from the BR-DWGD and TerraClimate projects.

More details on <https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brclimr>

## `epifeat`

An R package to extract epidemiological features from cases time series.

More details on <https://github.com/rfsaldanha/happyfeat>
